item.title: USA Political Election Logos
item.description: Logoblink has compiled logos from U.S. political campaigns for presidential election from 1960 to 2008. http://logoblink.com/2008/03/23/usa-polit-logos-2008-1960/

item.title: Vintage Logos
item.description: “A collection of vintage logos from a mid-70’s edition of the book World of Logotypes” Check the logo set on flickr. http://www.flickr.com/photos/mr_carl/sets/72157604144345854/
